title: is matchmaking broken or just me
body:
im silver 5 so basically bronze and i am constantly put against plat , diamond and even a few times master and challenger players 
it is so annoying when im on a team of silvers vs 2-3 plat+
not only is it annoying the higher elo players are incredibly toxic 
is it normal for this to happen bc its annoying as fuck 
most of the time its in norms however a few times its happened in ranked

replies.body: just had a game, my adc silver 4, theirs diamond 3
